author: Puidwen
title: nice set, but the instructions can be a bit of a pain
review: Taking out the bags you notice there are a lot of small parts.  I recommend building some of the larger parts first.  Some of the colors of purple look similar inside the instructions, so i recommend looking at the front of the instructions of box to find which colors part you actually want. A regular minifig will stay in the throne.  This set has a lot of stickers, including some reflective ones, which is interesting.  Both of the carpets were a lot smaller then i was expecting.  The instructions seem like their a bit incomplete, when you compare it to the pictures.
